name: The Horde (itch) (Kotaro Fujita)
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This is a game jam game for Philly Game Mechanic's November 2018 Game Jam.

You find yourself in an apartment with no context and you must figure what to do. You can pick up items to help you along the way but everything is not as it seems.

Controls:

WADS: walking around

Mouse: looking around

E or Left Mouse Click: Pick up items
